title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-hosted LLM runner with a REST API and CLI for macOS, Linux, and Windows.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for the Ollama API (async & sync).

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama (Node & browsers via fetch).

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package adding Ollama support to LangChain LLM wrappers.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Full-featured web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, RAG, user auth).

title: ollama-cli (mattw/ollama-cli)
summary: Rust-based TUI for browsing and chatting with Ollama models.

title: ollama-copilot (sugarforever/ollama-copilot)
summary: VS Code extension that uses Ollama models for inline code completion.

title: ollama-rag (ggerganov/ollama-rag)
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama + Sentence-Transformers + FAISS.

title: ollama-agents (jmorganca/ollama-agents)
summary: Proof-of-concept autonomous agents framework powered by Ollama.

title: ollama-helm (otw/ollama-helm)
summary: Community Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes.

title: ollama-docker-compose (awesome-ollama/docker-compose)
summary: Ready-made Docker Compose stacks for Ollama + WebUI + RAG extras.

title: ollama-nest (michaelpoluektov/ollama-nest)
summary: NestJS module that injects Ollama client with decorators and config.

title: ollama-fastapi (krrishd/ollama-fastapi)
summary: FastAPI service template exposing Ollama endpoints with OpenAI-style schema.

title: ollama-csharp (awaescher/ollama-csharp)
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async streaming and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-django (collabnix/ollama-django)
summary: Django app + REST API for chatting with Ollama models from Django admin.

title: ollama-slackbot (alexcpn/ollama-slackbot)
summary: Slack Bolt bot that answers questions using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-redis-rag (redis-developer/ollama-redis-rag)
summary: Redis vector-search RAG example backed by Ollama embeddings and chat.

title: ollama-obsidian (joethei/ollama-obsidian)
summary: Obsidian plugin enabling AI autocomplete via local Ollama models.

title: ollama-rust (mdrokz/ollama-rust)
summary: Unofficial Rust crate for Ollama REST API with Tokio and streaming support.

title: ollama-haystack (anakin87/ollama-haystack)
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders.
